p2: My name is Rodney, I was a client/server developer on the Microsoft platform during the 90s and 2000s. I caught up and am coding in the Javascript/Node/React ecosystem. I was also an Oracle dba, experienced in SqlServer and updated in Postgres / Mongo / Redis databases.
p3: Back in development, I'm looking for an opportunity that will allow me to pick up the pace again. I understand that there may be reasons that make this situation interesting for everyone.
p4: I am available for contact, thank you.
